replies.body: RIP again helmet bro {{summoner:3}} (Talon's splash)

aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaand hes back {{summoner:7}}
Weird that all the names agreeing with this site have numbers at the end of their names. Like they were generated or something. Weird.
Ah, the smurfs confirming it works strat. I like it. Can you keep your virus in pink? It clashes with my clean computer.
I hope Rito will make Helmet Bro on april's fool day{{summoner:2}}

And keep him. But give no warning to actually keep him.
Just announce him on April Fool's, then never give any more info until they just flat out release him and watch the confusion unfold.

Because why not?

i guess u didnt see teh wukong one before the color change

all the splashes are boss other than {{champion:40}} I prefer the old one
Wow, I feel the exact same way. That's the same splash art update I just mentioned. Glad it's not just me.
{{champion:26}} "I saw my splash art update coming."
Please Riot, we need a log out button, this would really help so I wouldn't have to close and open up my launcher again, I could just log out and hop on to another one of my accounts.
What if I told you Rito wants you to have only one account?
Can we get a shen buff tho? {{champion:98}}  {{champion:98}}{{champion:98}}
Keep the old {{champion:40}} splash art, its so much better then the new one
THE HIDDEN YASUO BUFF. YASUO SINGED SYNERGY FTW.

There's no bug fix section.

* Are the {{champion:34}} {{champion:40}} Q bugs fixed?
* Did  a more permanent fix for the {{champion:1}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:76}} cone bugs get implemented?
* Did Rickless find and fix {{champion:103}}'s Orb sometimes not dealing damage on the way back?
* {{champion:254}} 's E splash not dealing damage.  
Edit: The patches notes have been updated since i made this post.
And what about the Vi E bug? hmmmmm?
Screw the bugs. WE NEED URF

Screw the bugs. WE NEED ~~URF~~
Manatee with a Spatula, you mean
Why do you rename Jungle items that are going to be deleted in some weeks when the season ends ?
Those aren't items.  Those are the formal names of the blue and red buffs.

> Singe Rune Page

Come on rito.

Wait, hold on. I think I know what Rito *really* meant to say...
{{champion:27}} Rune Page
Close, but I think they *actually* meant {{champion:119}} rune page.

WHERE IS THE ANIVIA Q BUG FIX?!{{champion:34}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:34}}
Pwyff stated on Twitter that although he neglected to include it in the patch notes, ***the Anivia Q bugfix will be coming along with patch 4.19***.
Oooh, nice! I love the new splash art! Except the Janna one. It's nice, but seems like a big step backward in quality compared to the previous one in my opinion. Really like the other ones though!
{{champion:91}} IS TRYING TO KILL HELMET BRO!!!!{{summoner:7}}
To be honest I feel like that Victorious Morgana splash art doesn't live up to the actual textures in game
I actually thought it was the other way around. Though it's mostly her terrible model that is to blame, not the textures.
Keep going, splash-art team.

in my opinion On the splash art. the bodies look a lot better, though i'm dissapointed with how they've done the heads on a lot of them. too narrow, i enjoyed the more softer looks. Anyways, great backgrounds :)

The Ryze nerf is TOO HARSH. Really? I played ryze top against pantheon before reading these notes And was wondering why i wasnt doing any damage. I looked at Pantheon's stats. HE HAD BASE MAGIC RESIST. I was like "wtf" . So you mean to tell me that Ryze's Q (the only good thing going for him) is now like Annie's Q. Unlike Annie, Ryze's ultimate isnt a bursty damage dealer. It's an AOE/ spellvamp add on. So ryze lost the one good thing he had. RYZE HAS PLENTY OF COUNTERS.{{champion:266}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:83}}  Stop making everybody the same. What are you communists? EMBRACE INDIVIDUALITY. Champions counter eachother. That's why we play this game. Atleast for now. I'm afraid that eventually you guys will make LoL just five "X"'s and "O"'s on a white screen with sticks and a "poke" ability. PENTA POKE. #RIOTNERFSGG
Love the new splashes, but uh... can the East Coast get some love? {{champion:103}}
Where's Quinn's range buff?
A bunch of your splashes are showing the old image btw

While I appreciate the updated splash arts, I've noticed a problem with what this does to the in-game champion icons on the mini-map. Namely that they are often becoming harder to differentiate. The prior ones were often filled with bright, contrasting colors, making them distinguishable at a glance.

{{champion:35}} no word to describe my  happiness ;_;
